resources.string: This activity show and play the current song. There are buttons for moving to the next and previous songs in the playlist, one for a shuffled play and one that repeats the song. A seek bar shows the time position. One other seek bar for the volume of the song.

This activity is the summary to access to all activities. You can click on each part to access to a new activity. At the bottom, a little player showing the current song who is playing. 4 buttons at this player, play, next, previous and expend to access to the PlayingActivity.

This activity shows all playlists the user makes. In the future I will put a scrollview if there are too much playlist and change the TextView for a ListView of all playlists. I\'ll put buttons like play, edit, etc. He can also make a new playlist
This activity shows all artists. In the future if you click on one it will show all songs made by the artist. And you\'ll can play the songs of the artist.
This activity shows all albums. In the future if you click on one it will show all songs in the album. And you\'ll can play the songs of the artist.
This activity shows all songs. In the future if you click on one will play the song.
